name: UTCToMe
0:
”Alexa, open universal time converter and tell me what is fifteen hundred to my timezone”
”Alexa, open universal time converter and tell me what's my time when it's twenty-two hundred thirty”
”Alexa, open universal time converter and convert thirteen hundred forty-five to here”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: universal time converter
des: If you're told a meeting is going to happen at a particular time in UTC (Universal Coordinated Time), it'd be nice to know what time that is in your current timezone. This skill will convert the UTC time to the time where you are.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
